titleStmt.title: The English post from severall parts of this kingdome, lately sent to London: viz. From Truro, Iuly 26. Exeter, Iuly 29. Newcastle, Iuly 30. Yorke, Iuly 29. Lancaster, Iuly 30. From Dorchester, Iuly 31. Banbury, Iuly 28. Canterbury, August 2. Caermarden, Iuly 27. Lincolne, Iuly 29. Ely, August 1.
